summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 65th Street in the City of Seattle, from Weedin Place to 15th Avenue Northeast by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks, together with wooden cross walks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 34420 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
